SELECT INFO.RegistDate , INFO.AccountID , INFO.AccountCode , INFO.AccountName , INFO.TaxType , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('taxType',INFO.TaxType, #{companyCode}) AS TaxTypeName , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('taxCode',INFO.TaxCode, #{companyCode}) AS TaxCodeName , INFO.StandardBriefName , INFO.CompanyCode , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('CompanyCode',INFO.CompanyCode, #{companyCode}) AS CompanyName FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(AC.RegistDate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS RegistDate , AC.AccountID , AC.AccountCode , AC.AccountName , AC.TaxType , AC.TaxCode , AC.CompanyCode , ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(SB.StandardBriefName ORDER BY SB.StandardBriefID SEPARATOR ',') FROM covi_account4j_si.act_standard_brief SB WHERE SB.AccountID = AC.AccountID ) AS StandardBriefName FROM covi_account4j_si.act_account AC ) INFO WHERE 1=1 AND INFO.StandardBriefName IS NOT NULL
AND INFO.CompanyCode = #{companyCode}
AND ( INFO.AccountCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') OR INFO.AccountName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') OR INFO.StandardBriefName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') )
AND INFO.AccountCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
AND INFO.AccountName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
AND INFO.StandardBriefName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
,INFO.AccountID DESC
,
CompanyCode AccountCode AccountName StandardBriefName TaxTypeName TaxCodeName RegistDate
ASC DESC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}

SELECT INFO.AccountCode , INFO.AccountName , INFO.StandardBriefName , INFO.StandardBriefDesc , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('IsUse',INFO.IsUse, #{companyCode}) AS IsUse , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('IsUse',INFO.IsUseSimp, #{companyCode}) AS IsUseSimp , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('taxType',INFO.TaxType, #{companyCode}) AS TaxTypeName , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('taxCode',INFO.TaxCode, #{companyCode}) AS TaxCodeName , INFO.TaxType , INFO.TaxCode , INFO.RegistDate AS RegistDate , INFO.CompanyCode , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('CompanyCode',INFO.CompanyCode, #{companyCode}) AS CompanyName , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('IsUse',INFO.IsFile, #{companyCode}) AS IsFile , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('IsUse',INFO.IsDocLink, #{companyCode}) AS IsDocLink FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(AC.RegistDate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS RegistDate , AC.AccountID , AC.AccountCode , AC.AccountName , SB.StandardBriefID , SB.StandardBriefName , SB.StandardBriefDesc , SB.IsUse , SB.IsUseSimp , AC.TaxType , AC.TaxCode , AC.CompanyCode , SB.IsFile , SB.IsDocLink FROM covi_account4j_si.act_account AC JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_standard_brief SB ON AC.AccountID = SB.AccountID ) INFO WHERE 1=1 AND INFO.StandardBriefName IS NOT NULL
AND INFO.CompanyCode = #{companyCode}
AND ( INFO.AccountCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') OR INFO.AccountName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') OR INFO.StandardBriefName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') )
AND INFO.AccountCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
AND INFO.AccountName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
AND INFO.StandardBriefName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
ORDER BY INFO.StandardBriefID

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT AC.RegistDate , AC.AccountID , AC.AccountCode , AC.AccountName , AC.TaxType , AC.CompanyCode , ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(SB.StandardBriefName ORDER BY SB.StandardBriefID SEPARATOR ',') FROM covi_account4j_si.act_standard_brief SB WHERE SB.AccountID = AC.AccountID ) AS StandardBriefName FROM covi_account4j_si.act_account AC
) INFO WHERE 1=1 AND INFO.StandardBriefName IS NOT NULL
AND INFO.CompanyCode = #{companyCode}
AND ( INFO.AccountCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') OR INFO.AccountName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') OR INFO.StandardBriefName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') )
AND INFO.AccountCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
AND INFO.AccountName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
AND INFO.StandardBriefName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')

SELECT SB.StandardBriefID , SB.StandardBriefName , SB.StandardBriefDesc , SB.IsUse , SB.IsUseSimp , AC.CompanyCode , AC.AccountID , AC.AccountName , AC.TaxCode , AC.TaxType , SB.CtrlCode , SB.IsFile , SB.IsDocLink , AC.CompanyCode FROM covi_account4j_si.act_standard_brief SB JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_account AC ON SB.AccountID = AC.AccountID WHERE SB.AccountID = #{accountID} ORDER BY SB.StandardBriefID
mapper.update: UPDATE covi_account4j_si.act_account SET TaxCode = NULL , TaxType = NULL WHERE AccountID IN ( SELECT X.AccountID FROM ( SELECT AC.AccountID AS AccountID , COUNT(SB.AccountID) AS SB_CNT FROM covi_account4j_si.act_account AC LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_standard_brief SB ON AC.AccountID = SB.AccountID WHERE AC.AccountID = #{accountID} ) X WHERE X.SB_CNT = 0)
